name: Buck Budgie Knife
categories: Pocket knives and fixed blade knives
description: Have a little fun with your pocket knife. The Budgie is a stout little folder that brings a pop of colour to your EDC. Outfitted with premium S35VN steel (heat treated by Paul Bos, a legend in the knife world) this little folder takes an amazing edge and holds on to it.Drop point blade makes short work of everyday tasks.S35VN powdered metallurgy blade steel holds a keen edge.Stainless steel frame lock effectively gives this folding knife full-tang rigidity.Oversized pivot collar acts as a lock bar overtravel stop.Durable, shaped G10 handle for secure grip in all conditions.Right side tip-up carry pocket clip.Large lanyard hole has a tough red Cerakote®.
